material.mattext: Now that we have established that it is safe to use the z-test for p for our problem, carry out the test using Minitab. Paste the output in window below.

In our case, the data is summarized. We have a random sample of 316 airplanes, out of which 40 were found to have contaminated water. When you enter these two values into Minitab, set the null value to .035, and choose the "greater than" alternative, you get:
